title: Small Job: Manual tracing of a crown insignia
content:
Hello all,

I have a crown insignia that I need to trace, but not the necessary patience to do it myself right now.  
So I am looking for someone who is a whizz on the pen tool and would like to earn a little money.

Please contact me through my profile if you are interested.

Thanks,

Seb

 [‹ how to draw smooth S?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232703/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50601 "Go to previous forum topic") [Real free script font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232703/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50795 "Go to next forum topic")
author: all about seb

comments.content: Ideal job for [Aegir Hallmundur](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232703/http:/aegir.me/) who [does this sort of thing](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207232703/http:/ministryoftype.co.uk/words/article/our_friend_the_atom/) for fun.

Thanks Stephen! Seb, just sent you a message.

—  
Aegir
